fullplot: A rich and successful lawyer, the Counselor, is about to get married to his fiancèe but soon becomes entangled in a complex drug plot with a middle-man known as Westray. The plan ends up taking a horrible twist and he must protect himself and his soon to be bride as the truth of the drug business is uncovered and targets are eliminated.
plot: A lawyer finds himself in over his head when he gets involved in drug trafficking.
title: The Counselor

tomatoes.consensus: The Counselor raises expectations with its talented cast and creative crew -- then subverts them with a wordy and clumsy suspense thriller that's mercilessly short on suspense or thrills.
